body: The installation paths for the GMsh binaries, tutorials etc. are not contained within the CMake installation path (see the end of [build.out](https://gist.github.com/jppelteret/24b7ef9c38ee10072c721bcc89872b7a)). The result is that the destination directory contains the `include` folder, while binaries sit in another folder one level down (`../MacOS`) and the tutorials and examples are somewhere else entirely (`opt/spack`).
title: GMsh installation not fully contained with prefix
